scripts.dep-install: cd functions && npm install && cd ../frontend && yarn
scripts.build: cd functions && npm run build && cd ../frontend && yarn build
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --names FUNCTIONS,FRONTEND "cd functions && npm tun watch" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.deploy: cd functions && npm run deploy && cd ../frontend && yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:ci: cd functions && npm run deploy:ci && cd ../frontend && yarn deploy:ci
